caption.title: Nucleotide sequences of the chimeric 3â€™UTRs produced by a copy-choice mechanism.
caption.p: Alignment of nucleotide sequences of recombinants generated by template switch from Fig 7 is shown. Input LR-WT and Cbn-WT are presented as reference. Lineage-specific nucleotides from LR-WT and Cbn-WT are shown in red and blue, respectively. Sequence labels matches the numbering of individual clones 8 and 16 in Fig 7. Changes detected in chimeric RNAs are indicated with the respective colors. Sites of template switching are marked with orange arrows. Position 1 refers to the first position after the translation stop codon.
Click here for additional data file.
